Literature.Title: An adamantyl amino acid containing gramicidin S analogue with broad spectrum antibacterial activity and reduced hemolytic activity.
Literature.Author: Kapoerchan VV, Knijnenburg AD, Niamat M, Spalburg E, de Neeling AJ, Nibbering PH, Mars-Groenendijk RH, Noort D, Otero JM, Llamas-Saiz AL, van Raaij MJ, van der Marel GA, Overkleeft HS, Overhand M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis 1190901236(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae 1190900252(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae 1190901525(MIC=>64µg/ml)
